A pleasantly enjoyable little comedy/action/drama/romance film that occasionally rises above its lowbrow zombie tropes to remind us that family, home, and reliable friends are often all we need to get by in this messed up world.

This generation's definitive political satire starring an imaginary Hitler.

A bold and ambitious dramedy about the absurdity of hate. It worked better for me as a comedy than as a drama.
